External Industry References
Companies supporting the Web Start Wizard SDK.

InstallShield Corp.
        InstallShield Java Edition, a visual tool designed to create a single Java installation that's consistent in look, feel and functionality across multiple platforms.
 		website
 
jWizards.com Portal
        Providing the tools and resources needed to make wizards for your applications. Site contains Tip wizards, example source, FAQs, wizard message center and more.
